channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jesus Aguado

item.title: Hugo
item.description: I have started using Hugo for generating the content on this site. It is very lightweight and perfectly suits my needs, as I will be using this site to post regularly. Hugo has nice features such as handling tags, which permits easy navigation across the site. I am still tinkering with the settings, so expect a few changes.
